title: US and UK revolt forces Basel to rethink brutal crypto capital rules for banks
description: Basel’s toughest crypto rules are under review as the US, UK, and the EU diverge, with booming stablecoin adoption forcing a rethink of 1,250% capital charges, the group’s chair told the FT.

title: Ondo wins Liechtenstein approval to offer tokenized stocks in Europe
description: US tokenization platform Ondo is preparing to offer tokenized stocks and ETFs in 30 European countries after receiving approval in Liechtenstein.

title: Senators warn Trump-linked crypto firm may pose national security threat
description: Democratic senators are urging a probe into WLFI over alleged token sales to North Korea- and Russia-linked wallets, while researchers say some claims stem from false positives.

title: Coinbase working on prediction markets website, tech researcher says
description: Tech researcher Jane Manchun Wong, who has discovered unreleased features on Facebook and X, has found that Coinbase is working on a prediction markets website.

title: Saylor shrugs off suggestion Wall Street ‘hurt’ Bitcoin amid latest crash
description: Strategy’s Michael Saylor says Bitcoin has been “getting a lot less” volatile despite its recent price plunge, contradicting the outlook of many crypto analysts.

title: Senator Tim Scott pushes for December vote on crypto market bill
description: Senate Banking Chair Tim Scott says the committee could mark up a crypto market structure bill in December, sending it to President Donald Trump for early 2026.

title: Cloudflare blames database error for outage that took down 20% of the internet
description: Cloudflare says a bug in its Bot Management System crashed 20% of webpages on Tuesday, including some of the crypto industry’s biggest websites.

title: US won’t start Bitcoin reserve until other countries do: Mike Alfred
description: The US government will start buying Bitcoin for its strategic reserve when there is “enough pressure externally,” says crypto entrepreneur Mike Alfred.

title: Kraken bags $800M for expansion plans at $20B valuation
description: Crypto exchange Kraken has raised $800 million across two funding rounds, which boosted its valuation to $20 billion.

title: Canaan stock surges as Q3 revenue doubles on Bitcoin miner demand
description: Shares in Canaan jumped 20% on Tuesday as the Bitcoin mining hardware maker reported its third-quarter revenues doubled from last year.

title: Malaysia Loses $1.1 Billion to Crypto Mining Electricity Theft
